short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Renames ConnectWise manage tabs according to the contents of the banner

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is open-source, aimed to create an easy to install solution for all ConnectWise Manage users.

!!! You will need to specify the domains you want this to run on before it will rename any tabs. No wildcards are needed. !!!

From Manage Extensions

    1. Open your extensions
    2. Find ConnectWise-Tab-Renamer
    3. Click Details
    4. Click Extension options
    5. Specify your domain. ex: firefox.com
    6. Save

From taskbar

    1. Click the extensions icon
    2. Find ConnectWise-Tab-Renamer
    3. Click the three dots
    4. Click Options
    5. Specify your domain. ex: firefox.com
    6. Save

Source: https://github.com/DominickCobb-rs/ConnectWise-Tab-Renamer
